categoryContent.paragraphOne: Anytime you think about contacting an ex or old crush - rub one out first.

Before you get married, have in-depth, planning discussions around: kids, money, housing, vacations, current debt, retirement, day to day expectations, pets, in-laws, transportation, and careers... don't assume anything.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Ask many questions - ensure you are on the same page.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: After a bad break up, do ten things that your ex would never do with you.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: You'll feel better and realize how much of yourself was being held back.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Before ending a relationship, change all of your passwords and remove your account info / auto login on all devices.
Don't be on your best behaviour on a first date.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Do be your normal, everyday, relaxed hanging-with-friends behaviour.
categoryContent.paragraphThree: You want the person to like you for who you actually are, not who you are pretending to be. You will save yourself a lot of wasted time dating people who only like the fake you.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If your partner can't make a decision about where to eat, play the 5-2-1 game.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: You give them 5 restaurants, they pick two, and you pick from those.
